item.title: Polaris - Static Code Analysis
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the basic concepts of Polaris, the supported programming languages, how to use the SaaS platform, and how to configure and run Polaris for static code analysis. It also provides example YAML configuration files and how to view the analysis results.
